search.query:
index="ssphp_asset_inventory{{environment}}" (ssphp.resource.source="AZURE" OR ssphp.resource.source="GITHUB") earliest=-2d@d latest=now
[| inputlookup ssphp_last_asset_inventory_ssphp_run{{environment}}.csv where (inventory_type="azure" OR inventory_type="github") | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by inventory_type | eval st="(ssphp.resource.source=\"".upper('inventory_type')."\" AND SSPHP_RUN=\"".'SSPHP_RUN'."\")" | stats values(st) as st | eval st="(".mvjoin('st'," OR ").")" | return $st]
| table ssphp.resource.source, ssphp.resource.tenant, ssphp.resource.subscription, ssphp.resource.subscription_name, ssphp.resource.resource_group, ssphp.resource.id, ssphp.resource.name, ssphp.resource.full_name, ssphp.resource.type, ssphp.service.portfolio, ssphp.service.service_line, ssphp.service.product, ssphp.service.cost_centre.code, ssphp.service.cost_centre.title, ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code, ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code, ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner, ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email, ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email, ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email, ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email, ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email

| search (ssphp.resource.source="AZURE" OR ssphp.resource.source="GITHUB") AND (ssphp.service.portfolio=$tkn_portfolio|s$ AND ssphp.service.service_line=$tkn_service_line|s$ AND ssphp.service.product=$tkn_product|s$)
| table ssphp.resource.source, ssphp.resource.tenant, ssphp.resource.subscription, ssphp.resource.subscription_name, ssphp.resource.resource_group, ssphp.resource.id, ssphp.resource.name, ssphp.resource.full_name, ssphp.resource.type, ssphp.service.portfolio, ssphp.service.service_line, ssphp.service.product, ssphp.service.cost_centre.code, ssphp.service.cost_centre.title, ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code, ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code, ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner, ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email, ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email, ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email, ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email, ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email
| fields portfolio | dedup portfolio | sort 0 portfolio
| search portfolio=$tkn_portfolio|s$ | fields service_line | dedup service_line | sort 0 service_line
| search portfolio=$tkn_portfolio|s$ AND service_line=$tkn_service_line|s$ | fields product | dedup product | sort 0 product

| search ssphp.resource.source="AZURE"
| fields ssphp.resource.type | rename ssphp.resource.type as resource_type | eval resource_type_display=replace('resource_type',"microsoft\.",""), resource_type_display=replace('resource_type_display',"acr\.","")
| dedup resource_type_display
| table resource_type, resource_type_display | sort 0 resource_type_display

| stats values(ssphp.service.cost_centre.code) as cost_centre_code, values(ssphp.service.cost_centre.title) as cost_centre_title, values(ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code) as account_code, values(ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code) as activity_code, values(ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner) as cost_centre_owner, values(ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email) as cost_centre_owner_email, values(ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email) as financial_business_partner_email, values(ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email) as hosting_provider_email, values(ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email) as hosting_support_email, values(ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email) as product_owner_email
| transpose | rename column as key, "row 1" as value
| fields ssphp.resource.tenant | dedup ssphp.resource.tenant | sort 0 ssphp.resource.tenant | table ssphp.resource.tenant

| search ssphp.resource.tenant=$tkn_tenancy|s$ | fields ssphp.resource.subscription, ssphp.resource.subscription_name | dedup ssphp.resource.subscription | sort 0 ssphp.resource.subscription | table ssphp.resource.subscription, ssphp.resource.subscription_name

| search ssphp.resource.tenant=$tkn_tenancy|s$ AND ssphp.resource.subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ | fields ssphp.resource.resource_group | dedup ssphp.resource.resource_group | sort 0 ssphp.resource.resource_group | table ssphp.resource.resource_group

| search ssphp.resource.source="AZURE" AND ssphp.resource.tenant=$tkn_tenancy|s$ AND ssphp.resource.subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ AND ssphp.resource.resource_group=$tkn_resource_group|s$
| fields ssphp.resource.type | rename ssphp.resource.type as resource_type | eval resource_type_display=replace('resource_type',"microsoft\.",""), resource_type_display=replace('resource_type_display',"acr\.","")
| dedup resource_type_display
| table resource_type, resource_type_display | sort 0 resource_type_display

| search ssphp.resource.source="AZURE" AND ssphp.resource.type=$tkn_type_service|s$ | table ssphp.resource.tenant, ssphp.resource.subscription_name, ssphp.resource.resource_group, ssphp.resource.id
| eventstats count

| search ssphp.resource.source="GITHUB"
| eval Organisation=mvindex(split('ssphp.resource.full_name',"/"),0)
| stats values(ssphp.resource.name) as "Repo Name" by Organisation
| eventstats count

| search ssphp.resource.source="AZURE" AND ssphp.resource.tenant=$tkn_tenancy|s$ AND ssphp.resource.subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$ AND ssphp.resource.resource_group=$tkn_resource_group|s$ AND ssphp.resource.type=$tkn_type_sub|s$
| table ssphp.resource.tenant, ssphp.resource.subscription_name, ssphp.resource.resource_group, ssphp.resource.id, ssphp.service.*
| eval Ownership=mvappend("Portfolio : ".'ssphp.service.portfolio', "Service Line : ".'ssphp.service.service_line', "Product : ".'ssphp.service.product'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.cost_centre.code') AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.code'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.code'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Cost Centre Code : ".'ssphp.service.cost_centre.code'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.cost_centre.title') AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.title'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.title'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Cost Centre Title : ".'ssphp.service.cost_centre.title'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code') AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Account Code : ".'ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code') AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Activity Code : ".'ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Cost Centre Owner : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email'!="null" AND 'sssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Cost Centre Owner EMail : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Financial Business Partner : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Hosting Provider : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Hosting Support : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Product owner : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email'),'Ownership')
| rename ssphp.resource.tenant as Tenancy, ssphp.resource.subscription_name as Subscription, ssphp.resource.resource_group as "Resource Group", ssphp.resource.id as "Resource ID" | eventstats count

| makemv raw | foreach * [| eval raw=mvappend('raw','<<FIELD>>')]
| search raw="*$tkn_search_text$*"
| table ssphp.resource.tenant, ssphp.resource.subscription_name, ssphp.resource.resource_group, ssphp.resource.id, ssphp.service.*
| eval Ownership=mvappend("Portfolio : ".'ssphp.service.portfolio', "Service Line : ".'ssphp.service.service_line', "Product : ".'ssphp.service.product'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.cost_centre.code') AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.code'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.code'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Cost Centre Code : ".'ssphp.service.cost_centre.code'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.cost_centre.title') AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.title'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.title'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Cost Centre Title : ".'ssphp.service.cost_centre.title'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code') AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Account Code : ".'ssphp.service.cost_centre.account_code'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code') AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Activity Code : ".'ssphp.service.cost_centre.activity_code'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Cost Centre Owner : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email'!="null" AND 'sssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Cost Centre Owner EMail : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.cost_centre_owner_email'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Financial Business Partner : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.financial_business_partner_email'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Hosting Provider : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_provider_email'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Hosting Support : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.hosting_support_email'),'Ownership'), Ownership=if(isnotnull('ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email') AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email'!="null" AND 'ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email'!="",mvappend('Ownership',"Product owner : ".'ssphp.service.contacts.product_owner_email'),'Ownership')
| rename ssphp.resource.tenant as Tenancy, ssphp.resource.subscription_name as Subscription, ssphp.resource.resource_group as "Resource Group", ssphp.resource.id as "Resource ID" | eventstats count
